title: It Doesn't Snow in Hong Kong
overview: Five years ago by chance, Chen Bao Shan, a newcomer reporter at the time, met financial talent Lu Zi Heng on the first snow day. The two got to know each other and fell in love, but on their wedding day, Lu Zi Heng died in a car accident. Five years later, she was determined to forget the past completely and went to the port city where it never snows to start anew. However, during an interview assignment, she met Xiao Mu Chen, the prince of the Xiao Group, who looks exactly like Lu Zi Heng.
